```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = 'hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
a = sample(1:9, size = 1)
b = a + sample(1:5, size = 1)
lama = 1 / a
lamb = 1 / b
kl = -(log(lamb) - log(lama) + 1 - (lamb / lama))

sol_round = round(kl, digits = 2)
```

Question
========
Calculate the Kullback-Leibler divergence from exponential distribution with mean $`r a`$
to exponential distribution with mean $`r b`$.

Provide the answer with 2 decimal digits.
